body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service team. My name is George Alexander and I represent Better Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name please, so I can address you properly?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Katherine. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the data management at the Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand. To assist you better, can you please provide me with your phone number, spelled digit by digit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven zero six, two five eight, nine four three one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also provide me with your email address, spelling out each character?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's k a t h e r i n e s a n d e r s at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Katherine. I will look into the data management issue for you. Thank you for your time today.
